lenders.occupational_info:
We would like to Inform the following Message to one and all below,
 
Kindly Note 
  
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and also in other Overseas Countries for the Business and International Trades for all the Commodities in terms of Exports or Imports of any Commodities to India or else where in the World, Business Confirmations, Trade Negotiations, Business Tie ups, Buy Backs, Machinery, Mergers, Banking in India and Overseas Countries, Offices and Trade Representations at Overseas Countries, Turn Key Projects, Project Consultations, Project Finance, Payments, Letter of Credits( L.C's), Acquisition's, Barter Trades, Bi Lateral Trades, Credits and still more to go on Lines and Prints etc, 
 
Please get in touch with our Company in India for all of your needs and requirements linking many Countries in the World with your Company or with any of your regular Clients and Customers regarding various Business, Promotions and International Trades. 
 
We now seek your high handed support, cooperation and regular follow up in this said matter and we expect you to give us some priority and preferences in these Issues.
 
We do help you in all the above mentioned situations and then we could work together and then to proceed further. 
 
This is for your Kind Attention, Consideration and Information from our side and Company in India.
 
With Warm and Kindest Regards
 
Thanking You.
 
Sincerely Yours
For Asians Pacific Corporation, India
 
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY
Promoter
 
Please ask your Clients and Customers in your Country of India and then to write and address their Communications to us directly and let them send all of their Company Documents and Informations in our Company's Favor in India and to our Business Address as stated below, 
 
RAVI KRISSHNAMURTHY
C E O   / Director 
ASIANS PACIFIC CORPORATION
 
Communications / Business Address: 
Capricorn, Fern Land, North End, Villa No: A- 6, No: 103, Erikarai Street, Ground Floor, Behind Ramappa Nagar, Near Life Line Hospitals, 
Perungudi, Chennai. Post Code 600 096. 
Tamil Nadu State.South India. India

Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all, especially to those who are of the household of faith.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Traditional charity, while crucial, does not fundamentally relieve the ongoing need for people everywhere to be able to support themselves and their families. How do we not all profit from that?
lenders.occupational_info: I write medical education materials by day and bake to make the world a tastier place by night

lenders.name: Isaac K-W
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. I love this model of development: minimally invasive, and far more useful than a simple charity. I also waste a lot of money shopping online, so I loan to offset my consumer's guilt.

lenders.name: CUBEX

Cubex is a small professional web design company dedicated to providing its customers with exceptional website design solutions.
Located in Amsterdam, we have worked with businesses and individuals across the world on both large and small projects for a number of years.
Our professional team at Cubex is geared at working with its customers to create new websites and other professional website design solutions. Here at Cubex, we have the passion for designing minimal, elegant and clean websites for customers.

lenders.name: Mark
